title: The Myth of Hitler's Pope: Pope Pius XII and His Secret War Against Nazi Germany
description: In 1999, John Cornwell excoriated Pope Pius XII as "Hitler's Pope." In this book, Rabbi David G. Dalin provides a ringing defense of the wartime pontiff, arguing that Holocaust-era Jews justly regarded Pius as their protector, not their tormentor.
author: David G. Dalin
